h2_title: Where To Use The Sterness of Stone in Black Myth: Wukong
content: The second gate and final Tally is at the base of the sand slope onwards from the Fright Cliff - Rock Clash Platform Shrine, which is just after the Stone Vanguard fight.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Sterness_of_Stone.md', within the main section titled 'Sterness of Stone', specifically from the subsection 'Where To Use The Sterness of Stone in Black Myth: Wukong'.
The content is as follows:
The second gate and final Tally is at the base of the sand slope onwards from the Fright Cliff - Rock Clash Platform Shrine, which is just after the Stone Vanguard fight.
